title: Nasty Brutish
lyrics:
Nasty​ ​brutish
Far​ ​too​ ​long
One​ ​day​ ​closer​ ​to​ ​the​ ​end
Nasty​ ​brutish
Far​ ​too​ ​long

How​ ​fortunate​ ​for​ ​us​ ​all



Long​ ​may​ ​they​ ​sneer

Never​ ​give​ ​them​ ​satisfaction

Long​ ​may​ ​they​ ​leer

Let’s​ ​be​ ​who​ ​we​ ​are

And​ ​crush​ ​this​ ​fucking​ ​world



Acid​ ​burning

Iron​ ​breath

Acrid​ ​yearning

Taste​ ​of​ ​death



No​ ​funeral

Empty​ ​your​ ​pockets

Reach​ ​for​ ​the​ ​sky



No​ ​funeral

Say​ ​your​ ​prayers

Prepare​ ​to​ ​die
